name: PhotovoltaicData
0:
”Alexa, ask Photovoltaic Data to give the production of today.”
”Alexa, ask Photovoltaic Data to give the production of January.”
”Alexa, ask Photovoltaic Data to give the production of yesterday.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: photovoltaic data
des:
This is a non-official skill for pvouput.org
the skill answers questions such as:
Alexa, ask Photovoltaic Data to give the production of today.
Alexa, ask Photovoltaic Data to give the production of January.
Alexa, open Photovoltaic Data and configure.

the skill needs an initial setting with the command
Alexa, open Photovoltaic Data and configure.

You cannot use the skill without a proper account on pvouput and a setting with the command above.
If you don't have/use http://pvoutput.org please doesn't install the skill.

in the settings it will ask for pvouput systemid (5 digits) and apikey (number of your choice of at least 5 digits to be set as read only api key on pvouput).
